00038 #ifndef VideoCapture_h
00039 #define VideoCapture_h
00040 
00041 //#include "include/OpenCV.h"
00042 #include "include/Exception.h"
00043 //#include "Image.h"
00044 #include "Capture.h"
00045 
00046 namespace OpenCV {
00047     namespace VideoIO {
00052         class VideoCapture : public Capture {
00053         public:
00054 // Constructors
00055             VideoCapture();
00056             VideoCapture(const VideoCapture&);
00062             VideoCapture(const char*) throw (FileNotFoundException);
00063             virtual ~VideoCapture();
00064             
00065 // Getters & Setters
00067             inline long framesCount() { return (long)cvGetCaptureProperty(m_capture, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_COUNT); }
00069             inline double fps() { return (double)cvGetCaptureProperty(m_capture, CV_CAP_PROP_FPS); }
00071             inline CvSize frameSize() { return cvSize((int)cvGetCaptureProperty(m_capture, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_WIDTH), 
00072                                                       (int)cvGetCaptureProperty(m_capture, CV_CAP_PROP_FRAME_HEIGHT)); }
00074             inline int fourCharCode() { return (int)cvGetCaptureProperty(m_capture, CV_CAP_PROP_FOURCC); }
00075         };
00076         } // namespace VideoIO
00077 } // namespace OpenCV
00078 
00079 #endif // VideoCapture_h
